issue.title: [Python] Dependency load failure in Windows wheel build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9305](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9305). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Windows wheels are experiencing a DLL load failure probably due to one of the dependencies

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9305?focusedCommentId=17153445) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
